mapper.select: SELECT stock_id, FROM t_stock WHERE stock_code=#{stockCode};
SELECT stock_id, FROM t_stock WHERE stock_code=#{stockCode} FOR UPDATE;
SELECT stock_id, FROM t_stock ORDER BY stock_code;
SELECT stock_id, FROM t_stock WHERE stock_code IN (SELECT DISTINCT stock_code FROM t_stock_watch_begin WHERE DATE>CURDATE()-10);
SELECT stock_id, FROM t_stock WHERE stock_code IN (SELECT DISTINCT stock_code FROM t_stock_trade_buy WHERE status='BOUGHT');
SELECT stock_id, FROM t_stock WHERE last_date = (SELECT MIN(last_date) FROM t_stock) ORDER BY stock_code;
